#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int gcd(int x,int y)
{
    return y?gcd(y,x%y):x;
}
int main()
{
    int t,i,n,g,acut,cnt;
    long long int s,rf,ms,mrf;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        cnt=0;
        scanf("%d%lld%lld",&n,&ms,&mrf);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%lld%lld",&s,&rf);
            if((s>ms)||(rf>mrf)) cnt++;
        }
        scanf("%d",&acut);
        g=gcd(cnt,acut);
        printf("%d/%d\n",cnt/g,acut/g);
    }
    return 0;
}
